Classes in org.jhove2.module.assess used by org.jhove2.module.assess
AssessmentResult
          An instance of this object stores the assessment outcome for a given rule against the object being assessed.
AssessmentResultSet
          An AssessmentResultSet contains references to the object being assessed and the RuleSet being applied.

Rule.Quantor
          An enum used to specify the type of logical ANDing or ORing of the set of predicates comprising the rule's condition
